overview: From 2025-12-17 to 2025-12-18, ethereum-optimism/specs had 1 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 19 active contributors.

topPRs.title: add getrandom, eventfd2 syscalls and eventfd fd to cannon spec
topPRs.author: pauldowman
topPRs.body:
<!--
Contributions welcome! See https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Description**

Update Cannon specs to include recently-added syscalls `getrandom` and `eventfd2`, and add `mprotect` to the unsupported list (it was missing).

**Tests**

<!--
Please describe any tests you've added. If you've added no tests, or left important behavior untested, please explain why not.
-->

**Additional context**

<!--
Add any other context about the problem you're solving.
-->

**Metadata**

Closes https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/issues/17207

<!-- 
Include a link to any github issues that this may close in the following form:
- Fixes #[Link to Issue]
-->

topContributors.summary: smartcontracts: Focused on maintenance and testing within the Optimism ecosystem, merging a PR to update `opcmv2` to v7 in ethereum-optimism/optimism#18631 and opening a new feature PR to enhance upgrade test blocks. Their work involved modifying 117 files with a primary focus on bugfix work, touching tests, configuration, and code.

ajsutton: Contributed to the `optimism` repository by merging PR #18626, which added a command to calculate an output root, demonstrating a focus on other work and tests, with an even split between code and documentation changes. They also provided 4 approvals on pull requests and commented on 4 issues.
its-everdred: Focused on maintenance and dependency upgrades, merging two pull requests in `ethereum-optimism/community-hub`, including an upgrade to Next.js 14.2.35 in PR #1198.

pauldowman: Focused on core system enhancements, opening two significant pull requests, ethereum-optimism/optimism#18624 and ethereum-optimism/specs#869, to refine syscall handling and specifications, alongside creating an issue to set the default respected game type to CANNON_KONA in ethereum-optimism/optimism#18640. Their work today primarily involved modifications to tests and code, indicating a focus on foundational system integrity and configuration.

Inphi: Primarily focused on bug fixes, addressing a CI issue in `ethereum-optimism/optimism` via PR #18637, and also contributed to documentation by creating and closing issue #18095. Their work involved modifying 12 files with a primary focus on config changes.

maurelian: Focused on refining development workflows and security, opening two PRs to require multiple owners for CODEOWNERS file modifications (#18639) and to streamline tool aliasing (#18636), while also providing four reviews and making five commits across various file types.

0xiamflux: Created an issue to add a Resource Locator for v7_0_0 artifacts (ethereum-optimism/optimism#18633), while also engaging in 5 code reviews and making 5 commits that modified 25 files (+647/-200 lines), primarily focusing on other work, bug fixes, and refactoring.
opgitgovernance: Focused on routine maintenance, merging a chore PR in superchain-registry (#1185) for an automated codegen update, indicating a focus on configuration management.

serpixel: Focused on enhancing team ownership within the `optimism` repository by merging a PR that added the platforms team as codeowners for `op-deployer` (#18635), demonstrating a commitment to clear team responsibilities. This work involved modifying 2 files and making 2 commits, primarily focused on other work.

pcw109550: Focused on enhancing Optimism's testing and development infrastructure by opening two PRs, ethereum-optimism/optimism#18628 and ethereum-optimism/optimism#18627, to support new engine capabilities and light client configurations, with their code changes primarily split between tests and other work.
copilot-swe-agent: Focused on enhancing the `op-node` derivation pipeline by proposing a change to validate EIP-1559 parameters, as evidenced by the open PR ethereum-optimism/optimism#18630.

devin-ai-integration: Focused on the `op-node` component within the `ethereum-optimism/optimism` repository, opening a pull request to validate EIP-1559 parameters in the derivation pipeline, indicating work on core protocol logic.
bitwiseguy: Focused on maintenance work, opening a PR in ethereum-optimism/op-geth (#737) to update a dockerfile, and also provided one approval review.
tarunkhasnavis: No activity today.
stevennevins: No activity today.

janjakubnanista: Focused on a bugfix, opening PR #18632 in ethereum-optimism/optimism to address deployment overrides when checking custom intent, with changes across code and tests.
geoknee: No activity today.
almanax-ai: No activity today.
joshklop: Initiated a new feature by creating an issue in optimism#18625 to check for zero elasticity multiplier in eip1559 parameters, while also updating the superchain registry in op-geth#736.

Olexandr88: Today, Olexandr88 opened a pull request, ethereum-optimism/optimism#18629, to add `just` recipes for devnet-up and devnet-down, indicating a focus on developer tooling and environment setup. This work involved modifying 1 file with 9 additions.
